close_friends_subtitle: Share stories with your closest friends
close_friends_explanation: When you share a story marked as "Close Friends Only", only the people on this list will be able to see it. Your close friends list is private - nobody else can see who's on it.
add_followers_to_list: Add people who follow you to your close friends list
failed_to_add_close_friend: Failed to add to close friends
failed_to_remove_close_friend: Failed to remove from close friends
trusted_devices_subtitle: Manage devices that can skip 2FA verification
trusted_devices_login_prompt: When you check "Remember this device" during 2FA login, it will appear here.
trusted_devices_info_1: Trusted devices can skip 2FA verification for 30 days
trusted_devices_info_2: Each device is identified by a unique fingerprint
trusted_devices_info_3: Remove devices you no longer use or trust
trusted_devices_info_4: Clearing browser data will require re-trusting the device
remove_device_warning: You will need to verify your 2FA code the next time you sign in from this device. This action cannot be undone.
device_removed_desc: You will need to verify 2FA on this device next time you sign in.
login_to_view_devices: Please log in to view trusted devices
must_be_logged_in: You must be logged in to remove devices
orders_payments_subtitle: View your orders and manage payment methods
orders_will_appear: Your order history and payment methods will appear here.
help_center_desc: Browse our knowledge base and FAQs
live_chat_desc: Chat with our support team in real-time
email_support_desc: Send us an email and we'll get back to you within 24 hours
faq_subtitle: Find answers to common questions about using Wellio
faq_getting_started_q: How do I get started with Wellio?
faq_getting_started_a: Start by setting up your profile and fitness goals in Settings. Then explore the Dashboard to see your overview, use the Activity section to log workouts, and the Food section to track your nutrition. The floating action button (bottom-right) gives you quick access to logging actions from anywhere!
faq_track_workouts_q: How do I track my workouts?
faq_track_workouts_a: Go to Activity → Workout to log your exercises. You can create custom workouts, use templates, or browse our Exercise Library for guided exercises with video demonstrations. Track sets, reps, weight, and duration for each exercise.
faq_log_meals_q: How do I log my meals and track nutrition?
faq_log_meals_a: Navigate to Food → Food Log to add meals. You can search our food database, use AI meal analysis by taking a photo, or manually enter nutritional information. The app tracks calories, protein, carbs, and fats automatically.
faq_vip_benefits_q: What are the benefits of VIP/Premium membership?
faq_vip_benefits_a: VIP members get access to AI-powered insights, advanced analytics, the Trainer Marketplace, custom challenges, live workout sessions, medical history tracking, and priority support. You also unlock unlimited workout programs and exclusive features.
faq_earn_points_q: How do I earn reward points?
faq_earn_points_a: Earn points by logging workouts, completing challenges, maintaining streaks, referring friends, and engaging with the community. Visit the Rewards Store to redeem your points for premium features, discounts, and exclusive rewards.
faq_connect_friends_q: How do I connect with friends and the community?
faq_connect_friends_a: Use the Connect hub to access the Community Feed where you can share posts, like and comment on others' progress, and follow fellow fitness enthusiasts. You can also join Groups, participate in Challenges, and send direct messages.
faq_live_sessions_a: Live Sessions (VIP feature) let you join or host real-time workout sessions with other members. Work out together virtually, get motivated by peers, and enjoy guided sessions led by trainers or community members.
faq_data_privacy_q: Is my health data secure and private?
faq_data_privacy_a: Yes! We take privacy seriously. Your data is encrypted and stored securely. You control what you share publicly through privacy settings. Medical records are only accessible to you and require additional authentication. Visit Privacy & Security in Settings for full control.
getting_most_title: Getting the Most Out of Wellio
getting_most_desc: Here are some tips to maximize your fitness journey with our app:
tip_dashboard_desc: Your Dashboard gives you a quick overview of your progress, streaks, and recent activity. Check it daily to stay motivated!
tip_quick_actions_desc: The floating button in the bottom-right corner lets you quickly log workouts, meals, weight, and more from anywhere in the app.
tip_streaks_desc: Consistency is key! Log your activities daily to build streaks and earn bonus points. Longer streaks unlock special achievements.
tip_social_desc: Connect with others, join challenges, and share your progress. The community keeps you accountable and motivated!
session_management_desc: View and manage your active login sessions across devices. Revoke access to sessions you don't recognize.
revoke_all_desc: This will sign you out from all other devices and browsers. You will remain signed in on this device.
revoke_session_desc: This will sign you out from this device. You will need to sign in again to access your account from that device.
all_sessions_revoked: All other sessions have been revoked
security_audit_log_desc: View a history of security-related events on your account including logins, password changes, and settings updates.
recent_activity_desc: Security events from the last 90 days
